bs-contextmenu-desc: Provides context menus for various links
bs-contextmenu-pref-modus: Open context menu by (not for mobile):
bs-contextmenu-pref-modus-just-right-mou: Click on right mouse button (Pressing CTRL will show default browser context menu)
bs-contextmenu-pref-modus-ctrl-and-right: Click on right mouse button and pressing CTRL (Normal right mouse button will show default browser menu)
bs-contextmenu-media-view-page: View file description page and file history
apihelp-bs-contextmenu-tasks-description: Provides the context menu items in context
apihelp-bs-contextmenu-tasks-summary: Provides the context menu items in context
